data.text:
@tathagata2 2/3
WHAT NEW BENGAL NEEDS IS ENTREPRENEURIAL CULTURE AND MASSIVE  DEVELOPMENT.THAT CAN ONLY COME IF BENGALI'S CAN COME OUT OF THEIR ARROGANCE OF PSEUDO BENGALINESS AND ADAPT THEMSELVES WITH THE MULTICULTURAL VASTNESS OF INDIA.(contd.)

@tathagata2 3/3
BENGALI'S MUST UNDERSTAND THAT BENGAL CANNOT PROGRESS WITHOUT THE REST OF INDIA... TMC/MAMATA IS SIMPLY HOGGING THE MINDSET OF THE PEOPLE OF BENGAL... GOD SAVE BENGAL...
@tathagata2 aage bol le aami o aaj ke jetam
